ing: 1/3 cup white sugar, or to taste
des: "Cooked in a popcorn kettle, this chocolate popcorn is a quick sweet tooth fix slightly reminiscent of Cocoa PebblesÂ®!"
ins: Heat a popcorn kettle or pot over medium heat. Add popcorn, oil, sugar, and cocoa powder to the kettle. Cook, turning the handle slowly, until popping slows to 3 seconds between pops.
